# Mindburn (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level: [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]]**, [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (an empty crystal vial)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 round/3 levels

**Saving Throw:** Will negates; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Magic of Eberron (Wotc), pg. 99

This spell attacks a creatureâ€™s mind, causing the target to lose its highest-level remaining spell, spell slot, or infusion slot each round. The target gets a save to avoid this effect each round. On its first successful save, the spell ends.
